name: Lost Property (Michael Smith Unsolved)
description:
A game where you run lost property for a week in order to buy tickets to a festival.

Made for GDU game jam #2, a lot got cut for time...

Get through the week, drag items behind the desk and give them out when people ask. Maybe you'll earn enough, maybe you won't. 

Attributions for items

  • Sandwich icon made by photo3idea_studio from www.flaticon.com
  • Ring and phone icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
  • Wallet icon made by Pixel Buddha from www.flaticon.com

Feedback

Let me know what you thought in the comments or on twitter
